roleset.name: to give

example.name: accord-v: passive
example.text: The drug will be given treatment investigational new drugstatus, [a label]-1 accorded [*trace*-1]to drugs believed effective but lackingformal approval.
example.arg: drugs believed effective but lackingformal approval.

example.name: accord-v: active
example.text: Several of the city's black leaders, including Democratic mayoralnominee David Dinkins, have spoken out for racial gerrymandering [*0][]to accord blacks and Hispanics ``the fullest opportunity forrepresentation.''

example.name: accordance-n: Args 1 & 2
example.text: No nation disputed the accordance to Canada of rights of access.

example.name: accordance-n: Args 1 & 2 again
example.text: The accordance of a fair trial to each citizen is a principle of the Constitution.

example.name: accordance-n: All arguments
example.text: He wanted to challenge their accordance of legitimacy to the political system.

roleset.note: ACCORD-V NOTES: Member of VN class future_having-13.3. (from accord.01-v)
ACCORDANCE-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry accord.01, OntoNotes accordance-n grouping sense 2. No mapping to VN. Framed by Claire. (from accordance.01-n)

roleset.name: follow a procedure; be in line with expectations or other facts

role.descr: regulations, procedure, or expectations accorded with

example.name: accord-v: Args 0 & 2
example.text: His shift accords with the transformation of the colony's status, and was one of the details that helped me to recognize the model of dual chieftaincy in the Powhatans.
example.arg: with the transformation of the colony's status,

example.name: accordance-n: Likely most typical usage
example.text: This product must be disposed of in accordance with federal regulation.

example.name: accordance-n: Args 0 & 2
example.text: One can see, that satisfactory accordance of calculation results with experiments is observed.

roleset.note: ACCORDANCE-N NOTES: Roleset based on OntoNotes accordance-n grouping sense 1, NomBank frame file, no relevant PB verb entry, no mapping to VN. Comparison to verb-agree.01. (from accordance.02-n)

roleset.name: create or agree to a pact

role.descr: first party in agreement, both parties when mentioned together
subject of promise, subject/topic pact involves

example.name: accord-n: treaty subject
example.text: Japan will help monitor weapons and soldiers under the peace accord that ended Nepal's decade-long Maoist insurgency.
example.arg: that ended Nepal's decade-long Maoist insurgency.

example.name: accord-n: args 0 and 1
example.text: The European post-Cold War security accord

roleset.note: ACCORD-V, ACCORDANCE-N: Based on AMR data. Comparison to agree.01. Framed by Katie.
This is for the event of agreeing or establishing a pact, or its ongoing state, and not for reference to a set of documents
